options.content:
† Data applies to selected server.
‡ Data applies across all servers.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(1)
FROM games
WHERE started_at IS NOT NULL
    AND $server;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(plays.user_xid))
FROM games
JOIN plays ON plays.game_id = games.id
WHERE started_at IS NOT NULL
    AND $server;

SELECT
    $__timeGroupAlias(games.started_at,1d),
    COUNT(DISTINCT(plays.user_xid)) AS "players"
FROM games
JOIN plays ON plays.game_id = games.id
WHERE games.started_at IS NOT NULL
    AND $server
    AND  $__timeFilter(games.started_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT COUNT(1)
FROM games
WHERE started_at IS NOT NULL
    AND $server
    AND $__timeFilter(started_at);

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(plays.user_xid))
FROM games
JOIN plays ON plays.game_id = games.id
WHERE started_at IS NOT NULL
    AND $server
    AND $__timeFilter(games.started_at);

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,1d),
  COUNT(xid) AS "count"
FROM users
WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,7d),
  COUNT(xid) AS "count"
FROM users
WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at,30d),
  COUNT(xid) AS "count"
FROM users
WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  COUNT(id) AS "started"
FROM games
WHERE $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND started_at is not null
  AND $server
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  COUNT(id) AS "expired"
FROM games
WHERE $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND deleted_at is not null
  AND $server
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  COUNT(xid) AS "count"
FROM users
WHERE $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT (
        SELECT AVG(DAU.count)
        FROM (
                SELECT COUNT(xid) AS "count"
                FROM users
                WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at)
                GROUP BY FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM updated_at)/86400)*86400
                ORDER BY FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM updated_at)/86400)*86400
        ) DAU
    ) / (
        SELECT AVG(MAU.count)
        FROM (
                SELECT COUNT(xid) AS "count"
                FROM users
                WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at)
                GROUP BY FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM updated_at)/2.592e+06)*2.592e+06
                ORDER BY FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM updated_at)/2.592e+06)*2.592e+06
        ) MAU
    ) * 100.0;

SELECT
  guilds.name AS "server",
  $__timeGroupAlias(games.created_at,7d),
  count(games.id) AS "Games played on"
FROM games
JOIN guilds ON guilds.xid = games.guild_xid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(games.created_at) AND
  guilds.name IS NOT NULL AND
  games.started_at IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1, 2
HAVING count(games.id) > 10
-- ORDER BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 2 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  COUNT(id) AS "casual"
FROM games
WHERE $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND started_at is not null
  AND games.guild_xid in(
    304276578005942272, -- PlayEDH
    574711449566445603, -- TCC
    531209216443154443, -- Nitpicking Nerds
    815001383979450368, -- EDH Fight Club
    793590120049672242, -- IHYD
    750696719905456189, -- Tambayan
    752261529390284870, -- DE
    840959507747569715, -- Combat Step
    817867020837584906, -- CTC
    757455940009328670, -- Gaywatch
    1229388601113051198, -- Fight Club Royal
    924643928844673045, -- Turbo
    1176073262078378004, -- Breakfast Club
    689674672240984067 -- MTG@Home
  )
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1d),
  COUNT(id) AS "cEDH"
FROM games
WHERE $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND started_at is not null
  AND games.guild_xid in(
    113555415446413312, -- Competitive EDH
    1225118416298315857, -- r/cEDH Discord
    682734915846275184, -- Play to Win
    530219227924267008, -- PWP
    954838268275470367, -- ka0s Tournaments
    763138565231345665, -- WreckRoomCedh
    1206898724266319882, -- Espanola cEDH
    1036729704180355202, -- Training Grounds
    799686008811290626, -- cEDH PT
    1061492498402394132, -- cEDH Training Grounds
    966025312368463922, -- cEDH DE
    629303378685460530, -- AUS cEDH
    1110129065152745505, -- UK cEDH
    749653914839679057, -- cEDH Quebec
    947983400483033148 -- PDX cEDH
  )
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;
